title: Port CV page to SNES style
Blog discoverability: RSS, Schema, SEO, LLM
description:
Goal:
- Make blog posts easy for feeds, search engines, and LLMs to ingest.

Scope:
- RSS feed for /p posts.
- Schema.org BlogPosting JSON-LD + canonical/OG/Twitter tags.
- Sitemap inclusion for posts + feed + llms.txt.
- LLM-friendly surface (llms.txt and/or Markdown mirrors).

Out of scope:
- Editing post content or design changes.

title: Add RSS feed for blog posts
description:
Deliverables:
- /rss.xml endpoint generated from posts metadata.
- Items include title, link, description, pubDate, guid.
- Content-Type set to application/rss+xml (or application/xml).
- Channel fields include title, link, description, lastBuildDate.

Notes:
- Prefer using src/lib/generated/posts.json for speed and consistency.

title: Implement /rss.xml route from posts.json
description:
Include:
- RSS 2.0 structure with channel + items.
- Use site base URL when constructing links.
- Ensure date format is RFC-822 (pubDate).
close_reason: Implemented /rss.xml route with RSS 2.0 feed, added RSS link to blog head, updated sitemap to include posts

title: Expose RSS in head and sitemap
description:
Include:
- <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml"> on /p and/or global layout.
- Add /rss.xml to sitemap generation.
close_reason: Implemented /rss.xml route with RSS 2.0 feed, added RSS link to blog head, updated sitemap to include posts

title: Add Schema.org + SEO meta for posts
description:
Deliverables:
- JSON-LD BlogPosting per post page.
- Canonical URL + Open Graph + Twitter meta tags.
- Fields sourced from frontmatter with sane defaults.

title: Add BlogPosting JSON-LD on /p/[slug]
description:
Include:
- headline, description, datePublished, dateModified, author, url.
- image and keywords when available.
- Embed as <script type="application/ld+json"> in head.

title: Add canonical + OG/Twitter meta tags
description:
Include:
- canonical link with full absolute URL.
- og:title, og:description, og:type, og:url, og:image.
- twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description, twitter:image.

title: Extend post frontmatter for SEO fields
description:
Include:
- Optional fields: image, tags, updated.
- Define fallbacks when missing (site default image, updated=date).
- Update docs describing new fields.

title: LLM-friendly surfaces (llms.txt + Markdown mirrors)
description:
Deliverables:
- llms.txt at site root describing key pages and priorities.
- Simple, clean Markdown version of each post (or format param).
- Ensure content-type is text/markdown for mirrors.

title: Create /llms.txt manifest
description:
Include:
- Short summary of the site.
- Links to key pages and /p index.
- Optional section for lower-priority links.

title: Add Markdown mirror for posts
description:
Include:
- /p/<slug>.md or /p/<slug>?format=md.
- Strip layout chrome; include title/date/description.

title: Include blog posts in sitemap
description:
Deliverables:
- /sitemap.xml includes /p/<slug> URLs.
- Include /rss.xml and /llms.txt when present.
- Keep generation fast and deterministic.

title: Update sitemap generator to read posts.json
description:
Include:
- Load src/lib/generated/posts.json and add /p/<slug>.
- Continue to include static routes discovered in src/routes.

title: Add feed + llms entries to sitemap
description:
Include:
- Add /rss.xml and /llms.txt when routes exist.

title: Remove Twitter/X from social links
Bridge main site with etc.porg.dev toys
description: etc.porg.dev hosts various toys/experiments built in Next.js. Create better integration between the main site and etc.porg.dev - add interlinking, acknowledge/showcase some of the toys on the main site, create a cohesive experience between the two.

title: Blog metadata guardrails & documentation
description:
Goal:
- Prevent regressions in RSS/SEO/Schema/LLM metadata.
- Make expectations explicit for future agents and authors.

Scope:
- Automated checks/tests for metadata and feeds.
- Documentation updates (AGENTS.md + blog README).

title: Validate post frontmatter schema
description:
Deliverables:
- Script to validate required fields (title, date, description).
- Validate optional fields (tags as list/string, image URL, updated date).
- Add pnpm script to run validation.

title: Wire frontmatter validation into CI/dev
description:
Include:
- Add pnpm script (e.g., check-posts).
- Decide whether to include in lint or check.

title: Add tests for RSS/SEO/Schema/LLM outputs
description:
Deliverables:
- Automated checks that metadata exists and is well-formed.
- Cover at least one real post (e.g., /p/no-blogs).

title: Playwright: assert post JSON-LD + canonical + OG
description:
Include:
- /p/no-blogs contains BlogPosting JSON-LD.
- Canonical and OG/Twitter tags are present.

title: Playwright: assert /rss.xml contains post
description:
Include:
- /rss.xml returns 200 + XML content-type.
- Feed includes an item for /p/no-blogs.

title: Smoke test: /llms.txt and markdown mirror
description:
Include:
- /llms.txt returns 200 and expected sections.
- Markdown mirror returns text/markdown.

title: Update AGENTS.md + blog README for metadata
description:
Deliverables:
- AGENTS.md describes new frontmatter fields and new routes.
- src/routes/p/README.md updated with RSS/Schema/LLM expectations.

description: Rename 'Blog Posts' to just 'Posts' throughout the site. Fix the clunky page title in /p/ - currently shows 'Blog | P' which is awkward. Use a cleaner title format that doesn't reference 'p' or 'blog'.
